content: तृणं [तृह्-नक् हलोपश्च <ls>Uṇ. 5. 8</ls>] {@--1@} Grass in general; किं जीर्णं तृणमत्ति मानमहतामग्रेसरः केसरी <ls>Bh. 2. 29.</ls> {@--2@} A blade of grass, reed, straw. {@--3@} Anything made of straw (as a mat for sitting); often used as a symbol of worthlessness or uselessness; तृणमिवलघुलक्ष्मीनैव तान्संरुणाद्धि <ls>Bh. 2. 17</ls>; see तृणीकृ also.
